description: Siemens strategically adopts open source software to drive innovation while ensuring compliance and security through its governance framework, Open Source Program Office, and collaboration between cross-functional teams. Learn more about their policies, compliance, and community engagement to foster an open source culture.
keywords: Siemens, open source, governance, innovation, compliance, Open Source Program Office, OSS, security, collaboration, policies, license compliance, community engagement
title: Siemens Open Source Governance: Balancing Innovation and Compliance
